trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about a field across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un contratto che possono utilizzare per accedere alle informazioni relative a un campo attraverso i limiti di dominio e processo di applicazione.

trans-unit.source: An IRemoteFieldInfoContract represents a field of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: Un IRemoteFieldInfoContract rappresenta un campo di un oggetto remoto che implementa il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>interfaccia.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>

trans-unit.source: To access one or more fields of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: Per accedere a uno o più campi di un oggetto remoto, utilizzare il <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>metodo per ottenere un <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>che rappresenta il tipo dell'oggetto remoto.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the field that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce informazioni sul campo che questo <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData> structure includes an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that specifies the type of the field.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni fornite dal <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData>struttura include un <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>che specifica il tipo del campo.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData"></xref> that provides information about the field that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteFieldData"> </xref> che fornisce informazioni sul campo che questo <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the field that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il valore del campo da questo <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"> </xref> identifica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref> that identifies the object that contains the field.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"> </xref> che identifica l'oggetto che contiene il campo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that specifies the field value.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"> </xref> che specifica il valore del campo.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the field that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il valore del campo che si <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteFieldInfoContract"> </xref> rappresenta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref> that identifies the object that contains the field.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"> </xref> che identifica l'oggetto che contiene il campo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that specifies the field value.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"> </xref> che specifica il valore del campo.

trans-unit.source: The locale ID that the field will use for any locale-specific type conversions.
trans-unit.target: L'ID impostazioni locali che il campo verrà utilizzato per conversioni di tipi specifici delle impostazioni locali.
